page.title: 01A GENERAL VIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: The area covered in our 4 x 3 km. block is very varied. Situated to the south of Rochdale centre, it includes farming areas as well as a large housing estate; a country park as well as an industrial estate and the substantial suburb of Castleton, as well as part of Oldham. Through our block run major communication links. The M62 motorway from Liverpool to Hull and the A627M from Rochdale to Oldham cross this block, as do the Rochdale Canal, which runs from Manchester to Yorkshire, and the railway line from Manchester to Leeds.
